ing: 3 cups vanilla-flavored almond milk (such as SilkÂ®), or as needed
1/2 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree, frozen into small balls
n: Sissy's Frozen Banana and Pumpkin Smoothie
des: "This smoothie tastes like a milkshake - a healthy milkshake! The frozen bananas really give it that thick, creamy texture. Freeze your fruit the night before."
ins: Combine almond milk, bananas, pumpkin puree, and honey in a blender. Cover and blend until thick and texture resembles a smoothie, about 3 minutes.
